builds.title: Copymarket
builds.description: Copy trading platform for Polymarket. Allows anyone to connect their Polymarket account and copy the best traders.

builds.title: Amicus
builds.description: AI assistant for litigation review. Uses an advanced RAG pipeline to answer legal queries and drastically reduce research time.

builds.title: Poly Portfolio
builds.description: Platform that allows you to track exposure and statistics of any Polymarket account.

builds.title: Crypto Lottery
builds.description: On chain crypto lottery game. By using a staggered drawing process, users can trade tickets and earn rewards.

builds.title: PeopleWeave
builds.description: Analytics and community platform for research conferences to help attendees better meet people and to encourage diversity efforts. Used by 100s at top international conferences.

builds.title: FORM
builds.description: AI-powered basketball app that coaches players to improve their shooting. Launching soon!

research.title: MIRAGE
research.description: Model-agnostic framework that generates symbolic explanations and proof trees via SLD-resolution to explain black-box model predictions.

research.title: SpikeTrade
research.description: Large-scale stock market simulation framework that integrates Spiking Neural Networks with algorithmic traders and random traders to model realistic market dynamics.

research.title: Sentinel
research.description: Moves runtime assertions earlier in Python programs to detect violations before unnecessary computation occurs. Uses LLMs to generate early assertions and a multi-stage verification pipeline to prove logical equivalence with original checks.

research.title: Spice-X
research.description: Global and contrastive explanation framework that detects bias in LLMs by integrating multiple concept extraction methods to identify demographic disparities in model outputs. Uses conditional probability distributions and cross-validation across methods to surface population-level bias patterns.
